General.Name: MOBASE Co Ltd
General.Description: Mobase Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells mobile phone cases in South Korea. It also offers small injection products; manufactures and sells industrial sewing and embroidery machine; manufactures automobile parts; and produces broadcast programs. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
General.Address: Dongtan High-Tech Industry 1, Hwaseong-si, South Korea

2.Name: Mr. Byeoung-Jun  Sohn
2.Title: Co-Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Representative Director
